sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from "react"
import { useNavigate } from "react-router";
import {
    Flex,
    Stack,
    VStack,
    Text,
    FormControl,
    FormLabel,
    Input,
    InputGroup,
    InputLeftElement,
    Link,
    Button,
    Textarea
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

import{
    ArrowRightIcon,
    LockIcon,
} from "@chakra-ui/icons"

const Diary=()=>{
 
    return(
        <Flex 
          direction="column"
          w="100vw"
          h="100vh"
          align="center"
          justify="center"
          p={10}
          bgGradient="linear(360deg, #232A33 ,black)"
        >
            <Textarea
                w="full"
                h="70%"
                bg="#292C2D"
                focusBorderColor="#292C2D"
                border="none"
                _focus={{boxShadow:"0px 5px 5px black"}}
                boxShadow="0px 5px 5px black"
                fontSize="2xl"
                textColor="white"
                p={10}
                resize="none"
            />
           <Flex
            direction="row"
            bgColor="green"
            p={5}
            rounded="10%"
            w="45%"
            h="10%">

            
            <Button
             bgGradient="linear(#174A66,#051B3C)"
             boxShadow="0px 5px 5px black" 
             _hover={{bgGradient:"linear(#174A66,#08344D)"}}
            >
                <Text
                fontSize="sm"
                textColor="#7EB3E1"
                >
                    Post
                </Text>

            </Button>

            <Button
             bgGradient="linear(#174A66,#051B3C)"
             boxShadow="0px 5px 5px black" 
             _hover={{bgGradient:"linear(#174A66,#08344D)"}}
             mx={3}
            >
                <Text
                fontSize="sm"
                textColor="#7EB3E1"
                >
                    Clear
                </Text>

            </Button>

            <Button
             bgGradient="linear(#174A66,#051B3C)"
             boxShadow="0px 5px 5px black" 
             _hover={{bgGradient:"linear(#174A66,#08344D)"}}
            >
                <Text
                fontSize="sm"
                textColor="#7EB3E1"
                >
                    Desk
                </Text>

            </Button>

            <Button
             bgGradient="linear(#174A66,#051B3C)"
             boxShadow="0px 5px 5px black" 
             _hover={{bgGradient:"linear(#174A66,#08344D)"}}
             mx={3}
            >
                <Text
                fontSize="sm"
                textColor="#7EB3E1"
                >
                    Exit
                </Text>

            </Button>
        </Flex>

        </Flex>
    )
}

export default Diary;
